name: Major Sculpt Creme Contour & Powder Bronzer Duo
about: What it is: A creme contour and powder bronzer duo that defines, shapes and adds dimension to your complexion for a natural, seamless and sculpted look...What Else You Need to Know: Two complementary shades in one easy-to-use contour palette formulated to work together to achieve the perfect sun-kissed sculpt. First, apply the creme contour seamlessly onto the skin to create dimension. Finish by layering on the talc-free bronzing powder for a beautiful, natural finish.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients: Powder:.Mica, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Magnesium Myristate, OctyldodecylStearoyl Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Tropolone, Tin Oxide. MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR .(+/-): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6). ..Creme: .Octyldodecanol, EthylhexylPalmitate, Talc, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Behenyl Beeswax, Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ozokerite, Polyethylene, Stearyl Beeswax, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera/Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Aluminum Hydroxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Phenoxyethanol, Tropolone, Tin Oxide, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene. MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR (+/-):CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Start by using the dense end of the Patrick Ta Dual Ended Sculpting Brush (sold separately) to apply the creme with a gentle, stamping motion to create definition.- Using the fluffy end of the Dual Ended Sculpting Brush, layer the powder bronzer over areas where the creme has been applied to buff out any harsh lines and add warmth to the skin, focusing on areas where the sun would naturally hit the face. .- To contour the nose, apply the same technique using the Major Sculpt Dual Ended Precision Nose Contour Brush (sold separately)
